text: When the NYT uses its authority to make claims without substantiation, we're giving them huge power, and that power is not examined by the press. Without the NYT non-scandals reported as scandals we might have avoided the Trump presidency. The Times had at least as much influence as the Russian bots on Facebook and Twitter. Either they lose their authority, which isn't going to happen any time soon, or we come up with a way to watch over them the way they watch over the government and tech.
